column2:
"Not bad, <%me>.
I guess I can keep calling you by
your real name then."

"But don't let your guard down. One stupid
mistake and you'll be back to being called
Newbie again."

"That probably won't happen, though, at
least based on what I've seen. But we'll see."

"Now then, I look forward to
working with you in the future, <%me>!!"

"<%me>！
お疲れ！
名前呼びはキープね、うんうん！"

"でも油断しちゃダメよ。
何かポカミスがあろうものなら
すぐに「へっぽこぴー」に戻すからね！"

"……まあ、今回の様子を見るに
それはもうなさそうな感じだけど。"

"それじゃ、これからもよろしくね！
<%me>！"
